meanings.definition: Of the same species as another organism.
meanings.sent1: The conspecific birds chirped harmoniously in the forest.
meanings.sent2: It is important for researchers to study conspecific behavior in the wild.
meanings.sent3: The conspecific squirrel stole the other squirrel's acorn as a prank.
meanings.sent4: The conspecific bond between the wolves was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The conspecific fish swam together in perfect synchronization.

meanings.definition: An organism belonging to the same species as another.
meanings.sent1: The conspecifics formed a tight-knit community in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: The zoo introduced a new conspecific to keep the lonely monkey company.
meanings.sent3: The conspecifics had a party to celebrate their shared birthday.
meanings.sent4: The conspecifics in the herd moved as one entity across the savanna.
meanings.sent5: The conspecifics communicated through a series of calls and gestures.
